name: MotivateMe
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: motivate me
des:
Start your day by asking Alexa for motivation. Each time you say "Alexa, motivate me" you will get a random motivation clip from the best motivation content creators. Speeches by well known inspiring people will light up your mood and keep you motivated all day long.

If you have to stop watching, Alexa will offer to resume next time you start Motivate Me.

While listening or watching you can pause, start over and skip to next motivation. Just use "pause", "resume", "start over" and "next" commands.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
